@NorthernGather2 @TonyJuniper @spainshall @DefraGovUK @pow_rebecca @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency Hello, beaver wetlands formed by Eurasian beavers tend to create a mosaic or series of dams, canals & ponds, unlikely to all burst at once. Instead they increase capacity & reinforce each other. If one bursts, another often takes up the slack. Time to reimagine our rivers...
